    All Classes and Interfaces

    Classes
    Class
    Description
    ButtonEditor
    Cell editor for buttons in the table that allows for editing of values such as quantity, price, and employee roles
    ButtonRenderer
    A custom table cell renderer that displays edit This renderer ensures that each cell in the specified column is displayed as a button
    CatagoriesScreen
    The CatagoriesScreen class is the home screen for the employee.
    DrinkCustomScreen
    DrinkCustomScreen class represents a user interface for customizing a drink order This allows users adjust the temperature, ice level, sweetness, and toppings for a drink
    DrinkScreen
    Constructs the Drinkscreen with database connectivity
    EmployeeManagementScreen
    Screen that lists all employees and allows for changes
    GraphScreen
    The GraphScreen Class creates a graph showing the amount of used inventory for a given set of dates
    GUI
    GUI class for managing the database connection and displaying the login screen.
    InventoryScreen
    The InventoryScreen class represents the manager's view for managing inventory and generating sales reports in the database This GUI allows the manager to view, add, delete, and update inventory items, as well as generate sales reports based on date ranges
    LoginScreen
    LoginScreen class represents a user interface for employee/manager login This allows users to log in with their Employee ID and password It determines if the employee is a Cashier or Manager and directs them accordingly
    ManagerHomeScreen
    Page that has all the options screens a manager can go to
    MenuScreen
    The MenuScreen class represent's the manager's view of the menu with all of the drinks on it.
    MiscScreen
    The MiscScreen class represents a user interface for selecting miscellaneous items such as napkins, no drink, or a cup only option.
    OrderTrendsScreen
    Page that lists all employees and allows for changes
    PricesScreen
    The PricesScreen class allows a manager to view and update prices for drinks.
    ToppingsScreen
    ToppingsScreen class creates toppings selection screen Users can add toppings to their order while viewing thier order summary
